title: Software Engineer / Software Programmer / Software Developer - Recent Grads...
description: Join our exciting and dynamic team at Spacious, the #1 internet property platform in Hong Kong. As a Software Engineer, you'll work with a top-notch team of veterans and seasoned developers in Hong Kong, using the latest technologies to disrupt the property industry across the region. What is our mission? Spacious is a profitable, self-sustaining business that is quickly growing. We are dedicated to revolutionising the often stressful and overwhelming process of finding a property to buy or rent. With over one million high-value property searchers visiting our website and mobile app each month, we have established ourselves as the premier destination for property hunters in Hong Kong. We are growing quickly in the Greater Bay Area. Our mission is to simplify one of life's most daunting tasks and positively impact people's daily lives through our work. Our solution? To achieve this goal, we have developed a top-notch search experience featuring a premium user interface, extensive listings, and data comparison tools. In addition, our unwavering commitment to quality has allowed us to generate highly qualified leads for property agents, developers, and other advertisers who use our platform to reach our engaged audience. Our team culture? Our business's heart is a deep understanding of technology, as our technical founder has a long history in software engineering. We strive to provide an outstanding user experience while fostering a corporate culture that values inclusivity, development, and a positive and welcoming work atmosphere. Our team is diverse and globally minded, with representation from the UK, USA, India and China, and roughly half of our team are women. Many of our team members have been with us for five or more years. We operate in a flat organisation with open communication channels, granting our team members a high level of autonomy in a respectful and inclusive work environment. This is achieved from our top-quality office in the city's heart. This is us: www.spacious.hk Our Android and IOS Apps are both award-winning. Our company benefits? Our company benefits include an Annual End-Of-Year Salary Review, MPF, medical and dental insurance, 18 days of annual leave, a 5-day workweek, bank holidays off, a competitive salary package, and a budget for continual learning. Future projects? Future Projects you can get involved in include leveraging AI for Advanced Property Insights and User Experience. Spacious is set to integrate Artificial Intelligence (AI) in our next phase of innovation, focusing on: Data Analysis and Data Science: Utilizing AI to analyze millions of data points from our platform, enhancing market trend predictions, property valuations, and personalized user recommendations. Image Enhancement: Implementing AI techniques to improve property photo quality, ensuring a visually appealing browsing experience for our users. User Search Behavior Optimization: Using machine learning to understand better and cater to individual user search patterns, providing more accurate and personalized property matches. These AI-driven initiatives aim to elevate the property search experience, making it more intuitive, efficient, and tailored to our users' needs in Hong Kong and the Greater Bay Area. What are the qualities of our ideal candidate? We are looking for recent grads who are self-starters with strong analytical skills and a desire for continuous learning. If you have a degree in computer science, software engineering, or a STEM subject, and programming experience in C, C++, Java, Ruby on Rails, HTML, CSS, Javascript/JQuery/angular, we encourage you to apply. You must also be motivated, organised, goal-oriented, and able to take full ownership and responsibility for your actions. As a Software Engineer, your duties will include the following: Working on new product enhancements in Ruby On Rails, React Native & Javascript (70%) Learning about the existing technology stack and learning from the rest of the team (15%) Researching and understanding the latest technology trends affecting our industry and tech stack (15%) We care about your career path. As you gain experience and knowledge from the rest of the team, you will naturally move to more senior engineering roles with greater ownership levels. We have annual salary reviews and offer feedback during regular catchups. Ultimately, this leads to a career path as a senior developer or people management leadership responsibilities. Discover more by applying now We respect your time and have an efficient and simple interview process. To apply 1) Please submit your CV. 2) After reviewing your application, we will invite you to a single interview session. 3) Within 7 days, we will let you know if you have been successful. That's it, no unnecessary meetings. We work in a fun, collaborative, open space where creativity and ideas are encouraged to flow freely. You'll have the opportunity to shape the future roadmap and see the real-world impact of your work and how it directly impacts our clients. We offer guidance and mentorship to help you develop your technical, business, and entrepreneurial skills. Join us and be a part of one of Hong Kong's standout tech startups, targeting a huge opportunity in the Greater Bay Area! Our company benefits include an Annual End-Of-Year Salary Review, MPF, medical and dental insurance, 18 days of annual leave, 5-day workweek, bank holidays off, a competitive salary package, and a budget for continual learning.

title: Team Lead - Software Engineering (Back End)
description: EYT3 Limited (“EYT3”) is a Pure-Play Cybersecurity and FinTech / Regulatory Technology (RegTech) company based in Hong Kong. The group established in 2016. We specialize in helping organizations to transform to the new digital era through client centric approach and long-term trusted advisor. We are experts in niche areas such as Security Detection and Response, Cyber Threat Protection for Industrial Automation and IoT and Data Analytics for Financial Crime and Fraud Investigation. Responsibilities: As the Team Lead for Back End Software Engineering, you will spearhead the research and development of innovative back end solutions that align with executive management's strategic goals. Tasked with pushing the boundaries of current technologies, you will lead your team in exploring and implementing advanced algorithms, architectures, and scalable systems to support business objectives. Collaborate with senior management to understand company priorities and translate these into actionable, cutting-edge technical strategies. Your leadership will ensure that the back end team not only meets but pioneers industry standards, driving competitive advantage and technical excellence. Collaborate closely with the Project Lead & System Architect to design and develop a back-end system that fulfills business and user requirements. Work with the product and development teams through all software development life cycle (SDLC) phases to develop and integrate various components, and enhance system performance. Implement cutting-edge system design concepts within a DevOps framework to shorten the release cycle for the back-end. Conduct stress tests and fine-tune the system to an acceptable tolerance level. Adhere to security team instructions to mitigate risks in the back-end. Lead and mentor a team of junior back-end developers, ensuring the quality and timely delivery of project tasks. Gather requirements from business and operational stakeholders. Act as a team leader, overseeing the backend team, setting goals, and delegating tasks. Requirements: Degree in Information Technology, Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related field. Excellent communication, presentation, and problem-solving skills. Proficiency in both written and spoken English and Cantonese. Strong motivation and enthusiasm for exploring new technologies. Independent, proactive, mature, self-driven, and goal-oriented. Proficient with Windows and Linux operating systems. Advanced expertise in Flask, Java, Python with multiprocessing, SQL with ORM, Elasticsearch, gRPC, and ETL processes. Experience in any of the following is a plus: Machine Learning & Artificial Intelligence, High Availability systems, Spark, MLFlow, Gremlin, Cloud computing, Microservices Architecture, Databases (Graph & In-memory), and Kubernetes. Background in designing and implementing durable and resilient applications, including comprehensive logging, smooth onboarding and shutdown processes, and automated testing and monitoring. A minimum of 3 years of back-end development experience, with a proven history of team leadership. What We Offer: 5 days work week Flexible working hours and work from home policy Performance bonus Medical insurance On-Job training Job related course sponsorship Interested candidates, please send your resume, including your expected salary availability by clicking “Quick apply”.

title: Senior Engineer/ Eng/ Engineering Associate (PI), FinTech Software Development
company_name: Hong Kong Applied Science and Technology Research Institute Company Limited
description: The Hong Kong Applied Science and Technology Research Institute (ASTRI) was founded by the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region in 2000 with the mission of enhancing Hong Kong’s competitiveness through applied research. ASTRI’s core R&D competence in various areas is grouped under five Technology Divisions: Communications Technologies, Artificial Intelligence and Trust Technologies, Advanced Electronic Components and Systems, IoT Sensing and AI Technologies, and Innovative Mind. It is applied across six core areas which are Smart City, Financial Technologies, New Industrialisation and Intelligent Manufacturing, Digital Health, Application Specific Integrated Circuits, and Metaverse. Over the years, ASTRI has nurtured a pool of research, I&T talents and received numerous international awards for its pioneering innovations as well as outstanding business and community contributions. To date, ASTRI has transferred almost 1,500 technologies to the industries and been granted more than 1,100 patents in the Mainland, the US, and other countries. To support our constant endeavour to position Hong Kong as a world-class smart city and an international hub of innovation and technology, we are seeking qualified professionals to fill the following position(s): Job Responsibilities: Assist in ITF R&D project as assigned. Research and develop algorithms and software for emerging technologies related to artificial intelligence (AI), cryptography, and secured systems including blockchains. Explore and evaluate state-of-the-art AI models and develop working prototypes including data preparation, model development and performance validation. Collaborate with team members throughout the full product development and testing lifecycle. Conduct software testing and write and maintain technical documentation and reports. Perform ad hoc duties as assigned. Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree or higher in STEM-related disciplines (e.g., Computer Science, Electronic Engineering, Information Engineering, Physics, or other relevant disciplines). Experience or strong knowledge in one or more programming languages: Python, Kotlin, Java, JavaScript, NodeJS, Solidity, Go, Rust, C++, C, or R. Familiarity with data science, machine learning techniques (e.g. self-supervised learning, reinforcement learning) and frameworks such as PyTorch or Keras is a plus. Experience in research of generative models (e.g. transformers, diffusion models, VAE/GAN) is a plus. Experience with fine-tuning and deploying large language models is a plus. Knowledge of cryptographic principles, blockchain technologies, and system security practices (e.g., sandboxing, secure containerization, and runtime security measures) is a plus. Familiarity with back-end frameworks (e.g., Spring Boot, Django, Flask, FastAPI) and front-end frameworks (e.g., React, Vue.js, Angular, Flutter) is a plus. Understanding of finance or economics is a plus. Enthusiasm for learning new technologies and applying them to real-world problems. Lives ASTRI's values. The appointment will be on renewable contract terms with a competitive salary. Fringe benefits include paid leave, medical insurance coverage and contribution to MPF. The incumbent will normally work a five-day week. For interested parties, please submit your application with detailed CV within two weeks of the post date. Applicants are encouraged to submit their applications as soon as possible. The review of applications will continue until post is filled. The resume should not include any sensitive personal information such as ID card no. or passport number, photo, etc. Position offer is subject to the applicant’s experience and academic qualification. The application will be open until the position is filled. Only short-listed candidates will be notified. ASTRI reserves the right not to fill the position. ASTRI is an Equal Opportunities Employer. Personal data provided by job applicants will be used exclusively for recruitment only. For details, please refer to ASTRI Privacy Policy Statement.

title: Web3 Backend Development Engineer
description: Our client is specialist in computing, artificial intelligence, blockchain, and decentralized systems. Due to the business expansion, they're looking for a Backend Development Engineer to join their growing team (Current 30 members in Hong Kong) and play a key role in the development of our decentralized applications, blockchain platforms, and other Web3-based solutions. Job Description: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Web3 Backend Development Engineer to help us build, scale, and maintain the backend infrastructure for our decentralized applications. This role will focus on designing and implementing high-performance backend systems that interact with blockchain protocols, smart contracts, and decentralized storage systems. As part of the engineering team, you will work closely with frontend developers, blockchain developers, and product managers to create secure, scalable, and high-performing solutions that push the boundaries of decentralized technology. Key Responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain backend systems and APIs that interface with blockchain networks, smart contracts, and decentralized storage. Build and deploy serverless and decentralized backend services using Web3 technologies (e.g., Ethereum, Solana, Polygon, etc.). Implement secure, scalable, and performant APIs to interact with blockchain and off-chain data. Work with blockchain teams to integrate Web3 services into existing and new decentralized applications (dApps). Design and optimize solutions for large-scale blockchain data storage, indexing, and querying. Contribute to the architecture and engineering practices to ensure that backend systems are secure and scalable. Implement event-driven architecture, handling events triggered by smart contracts, transactions, and blockchain state changes. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features and improvements. Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize backend performance and security issues. Ensure that backend systems comply with industry best practices and standards for security and privacy in the Web3 ecosystem. Required Skills & Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience). Strong proficiency in backend programming languages such as Go or Python . Hands-on experience with smart contracts (e.g., Solidity, Vyper, etc.) and interacting with blockchains (Ethereum, Solana, etc.). Solid understanding of decentralized protocols, blockchain networks, consensus algorithms, and token standards. Knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and designing systems for scalability and performance. Familiarity with serverless architecture, AWS, GCP, or other cloud platforms. Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices. Knowledge of cryptographic concepts, such as public/private key infrastructure, encryption, hashing, and digital signatures. Strong understanding of security best practices related to Web3 technologies. Excellent problem-solving skills, and the ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment. Familiarity with Git, version control, and agile development workflows Welcome candidates who are no experience but interested in crypto! The company has great reputation and offers a permanent position to the suitable candidate. This will be a great opportunity for you if you are looking for a good career path in the IT industry. If you are interested and qualified, send your CV in word format to Sandy, s.lai@tenthrevolution.com or call me at +852 3018 0381 to discuss further.

title: Senior System Analyst
description: Who is Smoooth Biz? Entrepreneurs should only spend time on what truly matters to the business. That is why Smoooth Biz was founded, with the mission to apply advanced technology in everyday business usage to spare entrepreneurs from handling tedious work to focus on growing the business. Backed by a group of Hong Kong engineers, Smoooth Biz employs artificial intelligence and machine learning to provide cloud-based IT solutions to the business sector. We are a young team that runs super-fast and are looking for passionate individuals to join us. We strive to bring excellent products to the market; in order to do so, it is our promise to provide an inspiring workplace where great ideas can be nurtured. Bring your talent and drive to Smoooth! Let's find out what we can build together. Key Responsibilities: System Design & Backend Development: Lead the design and development of high-performance backend systems using Spring Boot and related Java technologies. Architecture & Scalability: Architect scalable, secure, and maintainable solutions aligned with business needs. Development Standards: Define and uphold coding standards and engineering best practices within the team. Deployment & DevOps: Manage deployment pipelines (preferably on AWS) and optimize CI/CD processes for smooth and reliable releases. System Monitoring & QA: Improve system stability through enhanced monitoring and testing strategies. Conduct thorough code reviews and drive QA improvements. Collaboration & Delivery: Work closely with Product Owners and Project Managers to translate business requirements into clear technical roadmaps. Qualifications & Experience Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Minimum of 6 years of experience in backend software development. Proven hands-on experience in Spring Boot, Spring Security, JPA, and modern Java development. Strong in system design, database architecture, and SQL optimization. Familiarity with NestJS, Docker, CI/CD pipelines, microservices, and AWS is a plus. Comfortable in agile environments and familiar with DevOps principles. Preference will be given to candidates with practical, hands-on development experience. Eagerness to learn new technologies and adapt to evolving business requirements. Excellent communication, problem-solving, and teamwork skills. What We Offer: Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunity to shape the future growth of a fast-growing company. Collaborative and innovative work environment. Professional development and career growth opportunities.

title: Unity Frontend/Backend Developer
description: Frontend Job Responsibilities: · Develop and maintain the frontend of applications for Android and iOS platforms using Unity C#. · Implement and optimize user interfaces to ensure a seamless user experience across devices. · Collaborate with designers and artists to integrate 3D assets and animations into the Unity environment. · Work on the animation system to create smooth and engaging character and object animations. · Utilize rendering techniques to enhance the visual quality and performance of applications. · Conduct performance profiling and optimization to ensure high performance and low latency. · Troubleshoot and resolve frontend issues to ensure a smooth gaming experience. · Stay updated on the latest trends and technologies in Unity development and mobile platforms. Frontend Requirements: · Proficiency in Unity C# for frontend development. · Experience with Android development using Java. · Familiarity with iOS development using Objective-C and Swift. · In-depth understanding of animation systems within Unity. · Experience in 3D design and integration of 3D assets. · Knowledge of rendering techniques and optimization strategies. · Ability to collaborate in a team environment and communicate effectively with cross-functional teams. · 3+ years of experience in frontend development, preferably in the gaming or interactive application field. Frontend Preferred Qualifications: · Experience in mobile game development and deployment on Android and iOS platforms. · Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git). · Understanding of performance profiling tools and techniques in Unity. · A portfolio showcasing previous Unity projects and contributions. Backend Key Responsibilities: · Design, develop, and maintain backend services (APIs, databases, matchmaking) for Unity applications. · Collaborate with Unity client developers to integrate APIs and ensure seamless client-server communication. · Optimize backend performance for low-latency, real-time interactions in multiplayer games. · Implement security best practices (authentication, encryption) to protect user data and prevent cheating. · Manage cloud infrastructure (AWS/Azure/GCP) for scalable, reliable deployment. · Troubleshoot server issues, monitor performance, and ensure high availability. · Architect solutions for leaderboards, in-app purchases, and social features. · Participate in agile workflows, including code reviews and sprint planning. Backend Requirements: · Proficiency in C# and .NET Core (or backend languages like Python/Node.js/Go). · Experience with REST/WebSocket APIs and real-time networking. · Strong knowledge of SQL/NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB). · Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) and containerization (Docker/Kubernetes). · Understanding of multiplayer game architecture (synchronization, matchmaking). · Experience with version control (Git) and CI/CD pipelines. · Ability to design secure, scalable backend systems. · Basic familiarity with Unity Engine for effective collaboration with client teams. · 3+ years of backend development experience, preferably in gaming. Backend Preferred Qualifications: · Experience with Unity-specific networking solutions (Mirror, Photon). · Knowledge of microservices, message brokers (RabbitMQ/Kafka), and caching (Redis). · Prior work on shipped games or live-service projects. · Degree in Computer Science or related field. Additional Requirements: · Familiarity with Java and Spring framework is a plus. · Experience with WebSocket STOMP, MySQL, and Redis. · Ability to write shell scripts.

title: Full-Stack Developer (FT/PT/Freelance)
description: Why Join Us? Play a key role in shaping a revolutionary hiring platform with social impact and emphasis of user experience Enjoy a flexible work schedule, location and mode Be part of an award-winning startup and collaborate with passionate teammates Thrive in a collaborative and innovative environment About Averi Averi is an AI-powered hiring solution transforming the recruitment landscape. Our platform leverages advanced AI to make hiring more efficient, flexible, and intuitive. About the Role We are seeking a Full-Stack Developer focused on full-cycle product development. You'll collaborate directly with our founding team to design, develop, and implement full-stack SaaS applications while addressing challenges from both technical and product design perspectives. AI Integration: Collaborate closely with the Data Analyst to implement AI integrations that enhance functionality and user experience. Performance and Security: Optimize application performance, scalability, and security through best practices and regular assessments. Research and Development: Deliver high-quality solutions while staying updated on emerging technologies and implement innovative ideas into the product. Possess a user-centric mindset and the ability to solve problems flexibly and resiliently. Passionate, determined, self-motivated and is ready to grow together with the company. title: Solutions Developer
description: You will be entitled to a competitive salary and attractive staff benefits including: Annual leave, birthday leave, paid sick leave, compensation leave, marriage leave, maternity leave, paternity leave and compassionate leave Five-day work week with flexible working hours and a hybrid workplace Comprehensive medical and dental coverage Professional training and career advancement opportunities Friendly working environment and work-life balance culture What can you learn? Communication: Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences. Collaboration: Ability to work effectively in a fast paced & multinational environment. 3-5 years of experience in software engineering, with a focus on backend development. Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Engineering or equivalent fields. Ready to join us? Apply now to submit your resume & expected salary to us! title: Senior Consultant, Full Stack Developer, Technology Enablement (MJ005505)
description: KPMG China provides multidisciplinary services from audit and tax to advisory, with a strong focus on serving our clients’ needs and their industries. Not only do we have an overriding commitment to provide the highest quality services for our clients, but we also strive to become a responsible corporate citizen that has a positive impact on our environment and community. At KPMG, you’ll translate insights into action and reveal opportunities for all—our teams, our clients and our world. Service Line Overview ​​​​​​​We help our clients to identify and solve the challenges that stand in the way of their growth and progress, to deliver the results that matter. We enable our clients to accelerate their advances in Technology, and changes in business models so that they can compete at the forefront of today and tomorrow’s world. Key Responsibilities Design front-end and back-end applications based on web technologies, including but not limited to ReactJS and Java Springboot. Develop and integrate solutions using methods like RESTful API. Create deployable packages in the form of Docker images. Collaborate with both local and offshore developers (in mainland) in a hybrid team model for project delivery. Assist clients in transforming/migrating their applications from legacy stacks to modern web-application stacks. Perform hands-on POC/Pilot on various Generative-AI initiative designs. Experience & Background 4-5 years of experience in programming MVC and SPA web applications. Hands-on experience in RDBMS, including both DDL and DML, with databases like Oracle DB, MySQL, MS SQL, and PostgreSQL. Proficiency in web frontend programming using popular JavaScript component frameworks like React.JS, Vue.JS, or Next.JS. Knowledge and experience in programming/converting Oracle PL/SQL is a plus. Familiarity with both JavaScript and Java Springboot programming. Experience with Git source code repository control. Experience in perform solutioning using UML design (e.g. Sequence Diagram, ERD). Knowledge in CI/CD pipeline development and execution would be an advantage. A technical mindset with great attention to detail. Knowledge in Python programming and experience using pandas and Jupyter Notebook would be an advantage. An interest in exploring a career not just in pure programming but also in consulting to advance how IT solves problems. Good communication and presentation abilities. Excellent command of English, Mandarin, and Cantonese. About KPMG At KPMG China, we are committed to being an equal opportunity employer, with zero tolerance for any form of discrimination against any persons. It is important for us to create an inclusive, diverse and agile workplace for our people to develop and thrive at both a personal and professional level. We strive to make ESG (environmental, social and governance) a watermark running through our organisation; from empowering our people to become agents of positive change, to providing better solutions and services to our clients to help them achieve their ESG goals. View Our Impact Plan to learn more about our ESG commitments and progress across four key pillars - Governance, People, Planet and Prosperity – and how we make a positive impact on our people, environment and society.
